name: SonarJS
initializeCommand: node ${localWorkspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/init-host.js || echo '[init-host] Skipped: NodeJS not available'
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /home/node/.certs /home/node/.m2 && cp /run/secrets/dc-npmrc /home/node/.npmrc 2>/dev/null || true && cp /run/secrets/dc-m2-settings.xml /home/node/.m2/settings.xml 2>/dev/null || true && cat /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt $([ -f /run/secrets/dc-cert.crt ] && echo /run/secrets/dc-cert.crt) > /home/node/.certs/bundle.pem && mise trust && mise install && git submodule update --init --recursive && npm ci
